remarks: If |f(x)| <= C for all x then it applies to all x in the image of |f(x)| (Contributed by Stanislas Polu, 9-Mar-2020.)
statement:
extoimad.1 $e |- ( ph -> F : RR --> RR ) $.
extoimad.2 $e |- ( ph -> A. y e. RR ( abs ` ( F ` y ) ) <_ C ) $.
extoimad $p |- ( ph -> A. x e. ( abs " ( F " RR ) ) x <_ C ) $.
$d C x y $.
$d F x y $.
$d ph x y $.
